Economists: Mass. able to support 3 casino resorts

The state has enough disposable income to support three profitable casino resorts and a slot parlor, economists and industry experts said today. (Globe, 3:36 p.m.)

Battleground: Obama and Romney in Ohio

Obama links Romney to pre-recession policies

In Cleveland today, President Obama linked Mitt Romney to what he called failed GOP policies and called for more taxes on the rich. (Globe, 3:42 p.m.)

Mitt Romney outlines his economic vision

In Cincinnati today, Mitt Romney gave an economy-themed speech and said President Obama was out of touch with the middle class. (Globe, 2:43 p.m.)
